sources.title: Rip Roarin' Buckaroo
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Rip Roarin' Buckaroo (1936) TOM TYLER
sources.description:
Stars: Tom Tyler, Beth Marion, Sammy Cohen 
Director: Robert F. Hill

Tyler, a boxer whose career ends after he loses a fixed fight, winds up with a job as a ranch hand. When his new boss gets involved with a crooked fight promoter, Tyler winds up back in the ring with a chance to vindicate himself!

sources.title: Tom Tyler | Rip Roarin' Buckaroo (Western, 1936) Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Tyler, a boxer whose career ends after he loses a fixed fight, winds up with a job as a ranch hand. When his new boss gets involved with a crooked fight promoter, Tyler winds up back in the ring with a chance to vindicate himself.

Director: Robert F. Hill

metadata.Plot: Fighter "Scotty" McQuade, contender for the light-heavyweight championship of the Pacific Coast,after being duped by his manager Ted Todd and fight-promoter Lew Slater, is disgusted with the fight game and decides to go back to punching cattle. He gets a job on the ranch owned by Colonel Hayden, where he once again encounters Slater, who has a crooked deal going that will cause Hayden to lose his ranch. With the aid of the Colonel's daughter, Betty Rose, and his pal "Frozen-Face" Cohen, McQuade breaks jail on a framed charge and puts an end to Slater's crooked dealings.
metadata.Actors: Tom Tyler, Beth Marion, Sammy Cohen
